channel.title: Hugo on Launch Today
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Launch Today

item.title: Install Tinysearch in Hugo
item.description: About Tinysearch Tinysearch is a full-text search engine for static websites built with Rust and Wasm. This is very useful and easy to use in our static site like this blog. And also blazingly fast. This is because tinysearch works with WebAssembly and runs much faster than JavaScript. In searching, tinysearch loads JSON file (like this, this blog’s article information) for search target, browse with search query and output the results which are matched.
